title: Relates to prostitution offenses occurring within one thousand feet of school grounds
summary: Establishing the offense of patronizing a prostitute within one thousand feet of school grounds, promoting prostitution within one thousand feet of school grounds, compelling prostitution within one thousand feet of school grounds and permitting prostitution within one thousand feet of school grounds.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the offenses of patronizing a prostitute within one thousand feet of school grounds, promoting prostitution within one thousand feet of school grounds, compelling prostitution within one thousand feet of school grounds and permitting prostitution within one thousand feet of school grounds.
